original_text: And after they had spent some time, they were sent off in peace by the brothers to those who had sent them.
korean_text: 얼마 있다가 평안히 가라는 전송을 형제들에게 받고 자기를 보내던 사람들에게로 돌아가되

sentences.original_text: And after they had spent some time,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 얼마 동안 머문 후에,

sentences.original_text: they were sent off in peace by the brothers
to those who had sent them.
